name: Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Playing Cards (itch)
name_original: Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Playing Cards (itch)
description:
Has the uncertainty of the future ever caused you stress or worry? Have you ever needed some comfort or reassurance in the face of the unknown?

For centuries, playing cards have been used as a tool for divination, long before the widespread use of the Tarot card deck. Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Cards offers an easy way to read  your fortune using modified playing cards for easier reading and divination.

Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Playing Cards is a unique take on Playing Card Divination, originating from the Romani people who lived in Midewestern America during the 1800s. Madam Ida swore by the cards' uncanny ability to predict the events of the near future, forever claiming that "The cards don't lie." Madam Ida taught her descendants her way of reading cards, and now, her method is available in digital form.

With Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Playing Cards, you can easily draw either Thirteen cards to determine whether or not your most immediate wishes will come true, or you can draw three cards to see whats in store for the week ahead. 

Easily read your cards with descriptions and themed versions of playing cards, for quick understanding. Madam Ida's Fortune Telling Playing Cards also features a Library to read your cards, as well as a detailed guide on reading cards. 

Read your fortune to see if your wish will come true, and see if your friends' wishes come true too!
